attributes.action: reject any petition which demands laws that already exist, or misrepresent  situations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
or where the petitioner shows an general ignorance of the law or legal process.

Therer are several petitions on the live site which demand the implementation of laws that already exist. There are others that misrepresent the nature and effects of existing laws when calling for their modification.

There are also several where the petitioner is clearly unaware of constitutional procedures and the complexities of the legal process. 

All such petitions should be refused and the petitioners referred to a training website on the relevant matters

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
